name: Mastodon
description: Mastodon is a free, open-source social network server based on ActivityPub where users can follow friends and discover new ones.

environment-variables.name: PUID
environment-variables.description: UserId for user running the container

environment-variables.name: PGID
environment-variables.description: GroupId for user running the container

environment-variables.name: LOCAL_DOMAIN
environment-variables.description: Unique identifier of server. It cannot be safely changed later

environment-variables.name: SECRET_KEY_BASE
environment-variables.description: session secret key, used for encrypting cookies. Changing it will break all active browser sessions. Generated with Rake (See Ruby on Rails)

environment-variables.name: OTP_SECRET
environment-variables.description: used for MFA (two factor) authentication. Changing it will break two-factor authentication. Generate with rake secret

environment-variables.name: VAPID_PRIVATE_KEY
environment-variables.description: Push notification private key. Changing it will break push notifications.

environment-variables.name: VAPID_PRIVATE_KEY
environment-variables.description: Push notification public key. Changing it will break push notifications.

environment-variables.name: SMTP_FROM_ADDRESS
environment-variables.description: From address for emails send from Mastodon

environment-variables.name: S3_ENABLED
environment-variables.description: Enable or disable s3 storage of uploaded files

environment-variables.name: S3_ALIAS_HOST
environment-variables.description: Alternate hostname for object fetching if you are front the S3 connections

environment-variables.name: WEB_DOMAIN
environment-variables.description: This can be set if you want your server identifier to be different to the subdomain hosting Mastodon

environment-variables.name: SIDEKIQ_ONLY
environment-variables.description: Only run the sidekiq service in this container instance. For large scale instances that need better queue handling.Only run the sidekiq service in this container instance. For large scale instances that need better queue handling.

environment-variables.name: SIDEKIQ_QUEUE
environment-variables.description: The name of the sidekiq queue to run in this container

environment-variables.name: SIDEKIQ_DEFAULT
environment-variables.description: Set to true on the main container if you're running additional sidekiq instances. It will run the default queue.

environment-variables.name: SIDEKIQ_THREADS
environment-variables.description: The number of threads for sidekiq to use

environment-variables.name: DB_POOL
environment-variables.description: The size of the DB connection pool, must be at least the same as SIDEKIQ_THREADS
